title: Pecha Kucha Font??
content:
Hi could anybody help with ID'ing the pecha kucha font?

and by any chance is it the same as the Y & R font? (or what is the Y&R font??)

many thanks :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [font sample-pecha.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131145631/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20sample-pecha.png) | 11.74 KB |
| [font sample-ynr.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131145631/http:/typophile.com/files/font%20sample-ynr.png) | 4.57 KB |
author: beek

comments.content:
‘Y & R’ is [Radio](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131145631/http:/www.vllg.com/Thirstype/Radio/mudTyper+Weights/).

EDIT:  
‘Pecha Kucha Night’ is also Radio with a modified ‘P’. BTW, ‘Pecha Kucha (ぺちゃくちゃ)’ is a Japanese word.

Just want to add, that it is of course the logo of [Young & Rubicam](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131145631/http:/www.myfonts.com/WhatTheFont/forum/viewthread.php?threadid=126854), which has to be »developed« out of Radio …
